requirement_tested: Stock search functionality by code or name
user_persona: A new investor looking to quickly find information about a specific stock.
user_goal: To successfully search for a stock using its name or ticker symbol.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Search Query
narrative_steps.description: Sarah visits the homepage and sees the search bar. She wants to look up Apple Inc. and types 'Apple' into the input field.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Apple' into the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The text appears in the navy-colored input box with a white background.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Search Request
narrative_steps.description: After typing, Sarah presses Enter to initiate her search.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system processes the query and displays a list of matching stocks including 'AAPL'.

user_persona: An active trader who needs quick insights before making decisions.
user_goal: To view key summarized data for a selected stock without delay.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Stock from Results
narrative_steps.description: Mark identifies AAPL from the search results and clicks on it to get an overview.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A summary card appears showing Apple's name, symbol, sector, latest price, change percentage, and market cap.

user_persona: A financial analyst preparing materials for a client presentation.
user_goal: To generate a custom stock report tailored to his client's interests.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Report Generation
narrative_steps.description: After reviewing Apple’s summary, Daniel decides he wants a detailed report and clicks the Generate Report button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A loading spinner is shown while the system compiles the report based on selected options.

user_persona: A researcher who prefers working offline in Word documents.
user_goal: To choose the desired output format for the generated report.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Format Dropdown
narrative_steps.description: Lisa notices the 'Select Format' dropdown and clicks it to see available export types.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dropdown menu expands showing options: PDF, Word Document, and HTML.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Preferred Format
narrative_steps.description: She selects Word Document since she plans to edit the report later.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dropdown closes and 'Word Document' is now selected as the report format.

user_persona: A student writing a paper focusing only on financial data.
user_goal: To include only relevant sections in the downloaded report.

narrative_steps.title: Customizing Report Sections
narrative_steps.description: Jamie checks the 'Financial Data' checkbox because that's the focus of her assignment.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only the Financial Data section will be included in the final report.

user_persona: A curious retail investor wanting to know more about a company.
user_goal: To review fundamental identifying details of a stock.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Basic Info Section
narrative_steps.description: Robert scrolls down to read general facts about Apple after selecting the stock.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Displays company name, ticker symbol, sector, industry, and website URL in a clean table layout.

user_persona: A day trader analyzing short-term performance patterns.
user_goal: To understand how a stock has performed historically through visual cues.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Market Trend Chart
narrative_steps.description: Ethan moves his cursor over points on the trend chart to inspect specific values.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over data points on the 'Market Trends' chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tooltip displays exact date and closing price at hovered point.

user_persona: An equity analyst assessing corporate profitability.
user_goal: To evaluate quarterly earnings and other fiscal indicators.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Financial Statements
narrative_steps.description: Chloe examines Apple's quarterly financial figures in tabular form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Table shows quarter-end dates with corresponding revenue, net income, EPS, and dividend yield.

user_persona: A visually impaired user requiring high contrast interfaces.
user_goal: To comfortably navigate the site with minimal eye strain.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Site Background
narrative_steps.description: Thomas notes that every page maintains a solid white background for readability.
narrative_steps.action: Load any page on the website.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All pages render with a consistent white background across all elements.

user_goal: To verify that all interactive components match the specified navy color palette.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Component Colors
narrative_steps.description: Zoe confirms that buttons, icons, and links use navy blue as the accent color.
narrative_steps.action: Look at various UI components like buttons and icons.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All interactive components are rendered in navy (#001F54) against the white background.

requirement_tested: User input interface for stock codes/names
user_persona: A beginner investor unsure of proper stock symbols.
user_goal: To easily locate a stock even if they don’t remember the exact code.

narrative_steps.title: Using Input Field for Lookup
narrative_steps.description: Alex types 'Microsoft' instead of MSFT into the search bar hoping for autocomplete help.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Input field accepts the full name and prepares for submission or auto-suggestion.

user_persona: A portfolio manager comparing stocks within a set timeframe.
user_goal: To adjust reporting parameters for focused comparative analysis.

narrative_steps.title: Expanding Parameter Controls
narrative_steps.description: Maya clicks on the 'Time Range' panel to limit the report scope to YTD data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Panel expands to show radio buttons for different time ranges.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Time Range Option
narrative_steps.description: She selects 'YTD' to compare year-to-date performance metrics.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Selected time range updates dynamically in preview settings.

user_persona: A busy executive needing fast access to investment summaries.
user_goal: To obtain a ready-to-use report without manual formatting delays.

narrative_steps.title: Triggering Automated Workflow
narrative_steps.description: Carlos hits the 'Generate Report' button to compile his selections instantly.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System begins automatic compilation and presents a loading indicator during processing.

requirement_tested: Data aggregation from stock market sources
user_persona: A data scientist validating source reliability.
user_goal: To ensure that all displayed numbers come from credible external sources.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Real-Time Data Source
narrative_steps.description: Priya checks whether the stock prices update in real-time via trusted APIs.
narrative_steps.action: Observe changing numerical values in summary cards over time.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Numbers reflect live updates pulled from integrated third-party financial data providers.

requirement_tested: Export or download functionality for generated reports
user_persona: A professor sharing educational material with students.
user_goal: To distribute professionally formatted reports among colleagues.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading Final Report
narrative_steps.description: Dr. Lee clicks the PDF download icon once the report finishes generating.
narrative_steps.action: Click the PDF download icon beneath the report preview.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Browser prompts to save the fully compiled PDF version of the report locally.
